title: Increase in slaves due to increase in demand

content.question: Which of the following is best concluded about slavery in British North America from the graph above and knowledge of the period?

choices.label: The increase in the number of slaves reflected a probable increase in the demand for plantation laborers.
The American Revolution abolished slavery in the former British North American colonies.
By 1770, the number of slaves in British North America surpassed the number of slaves in Spanish America.
By 1770, slaves outnumbered immigrants in British North America.

content.answer: The increase in the number of slaves reflected a probable increase in the demand for plantation laborers.
